/* bit_cracker007 */
 
#include <stdio.h>
 
int main()
{
  int i,N;
  scanf("%d",&N);
  int Val=N*N;
 
  // Output Array Counters
  int j, k, Row, Col; 
 
  int Travel[N][N];
  if(N%2==0)
  {
    for( i = 0, Col = N - 1, Row = N - 1;  Col >= 0 && Row >= 0;  i++, Col--, Row-- )
    {
      // Traversing Forward
      for( k = i ; k <= Col; k++ ) Travel[ i ][ k ] = Val--;
 
      // Traversing Downward
      for( k = i + 1; k <= Row; k++ ) Travel[ k ][ Col ] = Val--;
 
      // Traversing Backward
      for( k = Col - 1; k >= i; k-- ) Travel[ Row ][ k ] = Val--;
 
      // Traversing Upward
      for( k = Row - 1; k > i; k-- ) Travel[ k ][ i ] = Val--;
    }
  }
  
  else
  {
    for( i = 0, Col = N - 1, Row = N - 1;  Col >= 0 && Row >= 0;  i++, Col--, Row-- )
    { 
     // Traversing Backward
     for( k = Col ; k >= i; k-- ) Travel[ Row ][ k ] = Val--;
 
     // Traversing Upward
     for( k = Row - 1; k >= i; k-- ) Travel[ k ][ i ] = Val--;
     
     // Traversing Forward
     for( k = i+1 ; k <= Col; k++ ) Travel[ i ][ k ] = Val--;
 
    // Traversing Downward
    for( k = i + 1; k < Row; k++ ) Travel[ k ][ Col ] = Val--;
    }  
  }
  
  // Traverse the Output Array Left-to-Right, Top-to-Bottom
  for( i = 0; i < N; i++ )
  {
    for( j = 0; j < N; j++ ) printf( "%3d ", Travel[ i ][ j ] );
    printf("\n");
  }
  return 0;
}
